title: Add Quant Insider Market Making Challenge to About page hackathons list

requirements.summary: Add the Quant Insider Market Making Challenge as the 5th item in the About page hackathons array while preserving existing rendering.
acceptanceCriteria: The Hackathons list on the About Me page displays the new entry: "Market Making Challenge organized by Quant Insider and Fintech Club, IIT ISM Dhanbad".
The new entry is included as an additional item (now 5 total hackathon items) without removing or renaming existing entries.
The new entry uses the same typography, spacing, and list styling as the other hackathon items.
The code builds successfully with TypeScript with no runtime errors on the About Me page.

file_operations.description: Append a new (5th) object to the existing `hackathons` array with `name` exactly "Market Making Challenge organized by Quant Insider and Fintech Club, IIT ISM Dhanbad" (listed under Quant Insider), keeping the array structure consistent with existing entries and not altering the rendering markup or styling.
